text:
Weights & Biases | SF, CA | FT, ONSITE, VISA | www.wandb.com

Weights and Biases builds cutting-edge tools for machine learning. Our software makes it easier to build production-ready machine learning models at scale. We help ML teams visualize performance and iterate faster.

We're a small team based in the Mission. GCP, Python, TypeScript, React, Tensorflow, Pytorch. Looking for backend, frontend, full stack, and ui/ux engineers. If you love web development and are interested in machine learning lets talk.

vanpelt@wandb.com
